DUT.Table: CREATE TABLE DUTs ( Name TEXT, Classify TEXT, Unit, ExpectValue DOUBLE, MetrologyValues, Description TEXT, CreateTime DATETIME, ImagesPath TEXT, ReportsPath TEXT, Id TEXT PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL ); CREATE INDEX DUTs_Id ON DUTs(Id);
DUT.Insert: INSERT INTO DUTs ( Name, Classify, Unit, ExpectValue, MetrologyValues, Description, CreateTime, ImagesPath, ReportsPath, Id ) Values ( @Name, @Classify, @Unit, @ExpectValue, @MetrologyValues, @Description, @CreateTime, @ImagesPath, @ReportsPath, @Id );
DUT.Update: UPDATE DUTs SET Name=@Name, Classify=@Classify, Unit=@Unit, ExpectValue=@ExpectValue, MetrologyValues=@MetrologyValues, Description=@Description, CreateTime=@CreateTime, ImagesPath=@ImagesPath, ReportsPath=@ReportsPath, Id=@Id;

Engineering.Table: CREATE TABLE Engineerings ( Id TEXT PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL, Name TEXT, Description TEXT, CreateTime DATETIME, Path TEXT, CommandPools ); CREATE INDEX Engineerings_Id ON Engineerings(Id);
Engineering.Insert: INSERT INTO Engineerings ( Id, Name, Description, CreateTime, Path, CommandPools ) Values ( @Id, @Name, @Description, @CreateTime, @Path, @CommandPools );
Engineering.Update: UPDATE Engineerings SET Id=@Id, Name=@Name, Description=@Description, CreateTime=@CreateTime, Path=@Path, CommandPools=@CommandPools;

MeasureData.Table: CREATE TABLE MeasureDatas ( Time DATETIME PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL, Data DOUBLE, Flag TEXT, FuncValue DOUBLE, Note TEXT ); CREATE INDEX MeasureDatas_Time ON MeasureDatas(Time);
MeasureData.Insert: INSERT INTO MeasureDatas ( Time, Data, Flag, FuncValue, Note ) Values ( @Time, @Data, @Flag, @FuncValue, @Note );
MeasureData.Update: UPDATE MeasureDatas SET Time=@Time, Data=@Data, Flag=@Flag, FuncValue=@FuncValue, Note=@Note;

Slot.Table: CREATE TABLE Slots ( Id TEXT PRIMARY KEY, SlotType TINYINT, Config TEXT );
Slot.Insert: INSERT INTO Slots ( Id, SlotType, Config ) Values ( @Id, @SlotType, @Config );
Slot.Update: UPDATE Slots SET Id=@Id, SlotType=@SlotType, Config=@Config;

Instrument.Table: CREATE TABLE Instruments ( Id TEXT PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL, Name TEXT, AbbrName TEXT, Manufacturer TEXT, UseClassification TEXT, Model1 TEXT, Model2 TEXT, Description TEXT, CreateTime DATETIME, PhotosPath TEXT, FilesPath TEXT, ScpiList ); CREATE INDEX Instruments_Id ON Instruments(Id);
Instrument.Insert: INSERT INTO Instruments ( Id, Name, AbbrName, Manufacturer, UseClassification, Model1, Model2, Description, CreateTime, PhotosPath, FilesPath, ScpiList ) Values ( @Id, @Name, @AbbrName, @Manufacturer, @UseClassification, @Model1, @Model2, @Description, @CreateTime, @PhotosPath, @FilesPath, @ScpiList );
Instrument.Update: UPDATE Instruments SET Id=@Id, Name=@Name, AbbrName=@AbbrName, Manufacturer=@Manufacturer, UseClassification=@UseClassification, Model1=@Model1, Model2=@Model2, Description=@Description, CreateTime=@CreateTime, PhotosPath=@PhotosPath, FilesPath=@FilesPath, ScpiList=@ScpiList;

DUT.Table: CREATE TABLE DUTs ( Name TEXT, Classify TEXT, Unit, ExpectValue DOUBLE, MetrologyValues, Description TEXT, CreateTime DATETIME, ImagesPath TEXT, ReportsPath TEXT, Id TEXT PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL ); CREATE INDEX DUTs_Id ON DUTs(Id);
DUT.Insert: INSERT INTO DUTs ( Name, Classify, Unit, ExpectValue, MetrologyValues, Description, CreateTime, ImagesPath, ReportsPath, Id ) Values ( @Name, @Classify, @Unit, @ExpectValue, @MetrologyValues, @Description, @CreateTime, @ImagesPath, @ReportsPath, @Id );

Engineering.Table: CREATE TABLE Engineerings ( Id TEXT PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL, Name TEXT, Description TEXT, CreateTime DATETIME, Path TEXT, CommandPools ); CREATE INDEX Engineerings_Id ON Engineerings(Id);
Engineering.Insert: INSERT INTO Engineerings ( Id, Name, Description, CreateTime, Path, CommandPools ) Values ( @Id, @Name, @Description, @CreateTime, @Path, @CommandPools );
Engineering.Update: UPDATE Engineerings SET Id=@Id, Name=@Name, Description=@Description, CreateTime=@CreateTime, Path=@Path, CommandPools=@CommandPools;

MeasureData.Table: CREATE TABLE MeasureDatas ( Time DATETIME PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL, Data DOUBLE, Flag TEXT, FuncValue DOUBLE, Note TEXT ); CREATE INDEX MeasureDatas_Time ON MeasureDatas(Time);
MeasureData.Insert: INSERT INTO MeasureDatas ( Time, Data, Flag, FuncValue, Note ) Values ( @Time, @Data, @Flag, @FuncValue, @Note );
MeasureData.Update: UPDATE MeasureDatas SET Time=@Time, Data=@Data, Flag=@Flag, FuncValue=@FuncValue, Note=@Note;

Slot.Table: CREATE TABLE Slots ( Id TEXT PRIMARY KEY, SlotType SMALLINT, Config TEXT );
Slot.Insert: INSERT INTO Slots ( Id, SlotType, Config ) Values ( @Id, @SlotType, @Config );
Slot.Update: UPDATE Slots SET Id=@Id, SlotType=@SlotType, Config=@Config;

Instrument.Table: CREATE TABLE Instruments ( Id TEXT PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL, Name TEXT, AbbrName TEXT, Manufacturer TEXT, UseClassification TEXT, Model1 TEXT, Model2 TEXT, Description TEXT, CreateTime DATETIME, PhotosPath TEXT, FilesPath TEXT, ScpiList ); CREATE INDEX Instruments_Id ON Instruments(Id);
Instrument.Insert: INSERT INTO Instruments ( Id, Name, AbbrName, Manufacturer, UseClassification, Model1, Model2, Description, CreateTime, PhotosPath, FilesPath, ScpiList ) Values ( @Id, @Name, @AbbrName, @Manufacturer, @UseClassification, @Model1, @Model2, @Description, @CreateTime, @PhotosPath, @FilesPath, @ScpiList );
